# osfutils

> Some supplementary tools for [osfr](https://github.com/ropensci/osfr) that allow file caching and object encryption for sensitive data.

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R build status](https://github.com/nyuglobalties/osfutils/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/nyuglobalties/osfutils/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

## Installation

As osfutils does not exist on CRAN, you must install from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("nyuglobalties/osfutils")
```
